bioconda.name: masurca
bioconda.summary: MaSuRCA (Maryland Super-Read Celera Assembler) genome assembly software.

biocontainers.name: masurca
biocontainers.summary: Genome assembly and analysis toolkit contains of MaSuRCA genome assembler, QuORUM error corrector for Illumina data, POLCA genome polishing software, Chromosome scaffolder, jellyfish mer counter, and MUMmer aligner

biotools.summary: Whole genome assembly software. It combines the efficiency of the de Bruijn graph and Overlap-Layout-Consensus (OLC) approaches. MaSuRCA can assemble data sets containing only short reads from Illumina sequencing or a mixture of short reads and long reads (Sanger, 454).
